TopicTitle: Bill & Bob testing out the new buggy...

Articles.Content:
First trip out, and Bill couldn't help but to take a selfie....

First post, and even though I've owned the game quite sometime I am just starting to post or take photos and things and such... haha, idk if this pic is even gunna show, hopefully
You cannot show it directly from your computer, You need to upload it to some imaging hosting site. e.g Imgur.

Thanks Rasheed, I will be sure to do that next time, although it does work... whatever makes it easier, still getting the hang of the forum.. I did upload to Flickr which is what I posted here, but guess it isnt the best way.
